    Class
    Description
    class 
    CyberKatana
    Represents the CyberKatana Weapon in the game.
    It comes without an effect.
    class 
    LaserBlade
    Represents the LaserBlade Weapon in the game.
    It comes without an effect.
    class 
    NaniteLeechBlade
    Represents the NaniteLeechBlade Weapon in the game.
    It is paired with the HealthAbsorber ability
    It weighs 0.8 and is equipped with a D12
    class 
    NanoDirk
    Represents the NanoDirk Weapon in the game.
    It is paired with the DiceReroller ability, that allows its holder to roll twice its dice per attack
    It weighs 0.5 and is equipped with a D6
    class 
    PlasmaGreatsword
    Represents the PlasmaGreatsword Weapon in the game.
    It comes without an effect.
    class 
    PulseStaff
    Represents the PulseStaff Weapon in the game.
    The PulseStaff is an rare heavy weapon with a long blade that can be found in the game.
